string.value: According to #p1101002#, you can take your Knighthood Exam if you go see #b#p1101003##k, the Chief Knight of Light. Better head over to Ereve and meet #p1101003#.

The Knighthood Exam has started. The test itself is actually quite simple. You just need to reach the end of the Training Forest, enter #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k, and defeat the Tiguru inside while bringing back #t4032096#. Better find #b30 #t4032096#s#k and bring them back to #p1101003#. \n\n#i4032096# #t4032096# #b#c4032096# / 30#k

You have successfully completed the Knighthood Exam and officially dropped the "in-Training" from your title. As a bonafide Cygnus Knight, do your best to work hard so you will never be ashamed of yourself.

Do you wish to take the Knighthood Exam? Based on your contributions to Cygnus Knights so far, it is indeed hard to keep you here as the Knight-in-Training. Fine, I will let you take the Knighthood Exam. Are you ready?
The test is rather simple. Enter #bthe 2nd Drill Hall#k located at the end of the Training Forest, defeat the Mimis inside, and bring back the #b#t4032096#s#k that they have with them. I need #b30#k.
If you can bring all the #t4032096#s back, then I will grant you the right to become a Knight. At this point, I need your skills to do the talking.
Talk to me when you are ready to take the test.
I don't think you have found #b30 #t4032096#s#k yet. Go to #bHall #2#k and find them.
